property.name: enableSslVerification
property.label: SSL Verification
property.description: Enable SSL Verification

property.name: srid
property.label: srid
property.description: The instance of ISPW you are working with.

property.name: retryLimit
property.label: Retry Limit
property.description: Number of times to retry the task before failing, in the case that a 409 response status is returned

property.name: retryInterval
property.label: Retry Interval (sec)
property.description: Number of seconds to wait for retries

property.name: srid
property.label: srid
property.description: The instance of ISPW you are working with.

property.name: pollInterval
property.description: Time in seconds between each polling action

property.name: pollTimeoutCount
property.description: Number of times to poll before declaring a timeout failure, must be 1 or greater
property.label: Number of times to poll before timeout failure

property.name: expectedStatusList
property.description: List one or more expected values for the 'state' field

property.name: statusResult
property.description: The expected status that was returned
property.label: Final Retrieved Status

property.name: runtimeConfiguration
property.label: Runtime Configuration
property.description: See ISPW administrator for valid values

property.name: callbackTaskId
property.label: Callback Task Id
property.description: Manual task used for callback

property.name: callbackUrl
property.label: Callback Url
property.description: XLR base url used for callback

property.name: callbackUsername
property.label: Callback Username
property.description: XLR username used for callback

property.name: callbackPassword
property.label: Callback Password
property.description: XLR password used for callback

type.label: ISPW Assignments: Get Assignment Task List

property.name: level
property.label: Level
property.description: Optional - All tasks in the assignment at this level will be displayed.

property.name: tasks
property.label: Tasks
property.description: A map containing all tasks. Key is the taskId, Value is a json string containing all fields.

type.label: ISPW Assignments: Get Assignment Task Information

property.name: taskId
property.label: Task id
property.description: The task id you want information on.

type.label: ISPW Assignments: Generate Tasks in Assignment

property.name: level
property.label: Level
property.description: Optional -All tasks in the assignment at this level will be generated.

property.name: autoDeploy
property.label: Auto Deploy
property.description: Promotes can be set up to automatically Deploy as well by an option set up by the ISPW Administrator

property.name: level
property.label: Level
property.description: All tasks in the assignment at this level will be promoted.

property.name: changeType
property.label: Change Type
property.description: Optional, S for standard, I for incidental, or E for emergency. Default value of S

property.name: executionStatus
property.label: Execution Status
property.description: Optional, I for immediate execution or at start date/time, H to create request in hold. Default is I

property.name: override
property.label: Override
property.description: Allow to override a higher version in next level when promote

property.name: autoDeploy
property.label: Auto Deploy
property.description: Promotes can be set up to automatically Deploy as well by an option set up by the ISPW Administrator

property.name: level
property.label: Level
property.description: All tasks in the assignment at this level will be deployed.

property.name: changeType
property.label: Change Type
property.description: Optional, S for standard, I for incidental, or E for emergency. Default value of S

property.name: executionStatus
property.label: Execution Status
property.description: Optional, I for immediate execution or at start date/time, H to create request in hold. Default is I

property.name: dpenvlst
property.label: DPENVLST parameter
property.description: The DPENVLST parameter allows you to override the Environments configured for Deploy at that level. If you wish to Deploy to only certain Environments, you can list them here, separated by a space. The length of the field is limited to 80.

property.name: system
property.label: System
property.description: Allows you to specify a specific System for the Deploy

property.name: level
property.label: Level
property.description: All tasks in the assignment at this level will be regressed.

property.name: changeType
property.label: Change Type
property.description: Optional, S for standard, I for incidental, or E for emergency. Default value of S

property.name: executionStatus
property.label: Execution Status
property.description: Optional, I for immediate execution or at start date/time, H to create request in hold. Default is I

property.name: relId
property.label: Release id
property.description: 8 character value, can only be used if Release prefix is not set

property.name: relPrefix
property.label: Release prefix
property.description: 8 character value, can only be used if Release id is not set

property.name: relId
property.label: Release id
property.description: 8 character value, the release ID you want information on.

property.label: Set id

property.name: changeType

property.name: title
property.description: Tile title

property.name: action
property.description: Optional: If you wish to display only tasks of a certain type, enter the task type here. Some possible values are Deploy, Promote, CreateRelease, PromoteAssignment. You can enter a string followed by an asterisk to filter for an included string rather than an exact type match. Example: Deploy* If you wish to display all ispw tasks, leave this field empty.
